snippet: Tim Armstrong, the chief executive of AOL, had a sentimental, and some would say debilitating, attachment to Patch, a network of local news sites that he is finally winding down.
abstract: David Carr The Media Equation column says AOL chief executive Tim Armstrong had a sentimental, and some would say debilitating, attachment to Patch, network of local news sites he helped invent that he is finally winding down; observes hunt to own the lucrative local ad market, Armstrong's white whale, is over.
lead_paragraph: Tim Armstrong, the chief executive of AOL, had a sentimental, and some would say debilitating, attachment to Patch, a network of local news sites that he is finally winding down.

headline.main: AOL Chief’s White Whale Finally Slips His Grasp
headline.print_headline: AOL Chief’s White Whale Finally Slips His Grasp
